line_1: And shakes the Summer from his radiant mane;
line_2: Where yet the Lion climbs the ethereal plain,

line_1: Thick as the hairs, which rear the Lion's mane,
line_2: Or fringe the Boar, that bays the hunter-train;

line_1: When Fairies ride fix'd in his twisted Mane.

line_1: His Rage; the Lion drop his crested Mane,
line_2: Can make the Wolf, or foaming Boar restrain
